about_the_game:
Undercover Fools is a co-op action spy game, assemble a team or go it alone to infiltrate secure buildings, avoid treacherous traps and complete challenging missions armed with the coolest spy gear!

  • Mastery of Stealth

    Your main goal is to remain unnoticed. Use shadows and hidden places to avoid detection by guards, or distract enemies with special gadgets. Every step you take can be decisive – act carefully!

  • Every time - a new mission

    Procedural map generation ensures a unique layout of rooms, obstacles, and enemies each time you attempt it. This makes each attempt unpredictable and adds an element of surprise to your spy adventure.

  • Spy gadgets

    Your gear is the key to success. You have powerful spy gadgets at your disposal: a grappling hook, a jammer, a tranquilizer gun, and more. Each gadget helps you bypass obstacles or make life difficult for security guards.

  • Diversity of threats

    From patrolling guards to surveillance cameras and fast drones, each type of security requires a different approach. Use agility and wits to neutralize or avoid dangers.

  • Choosing a path

    Break down the back door, burn through the roof lock or enter through the main entrance. Your success depends on your choice of strategy. Use different approaches to achieve your goal - from stealth entry to distraction maneuvers.

  • Recreation and entertainment area

    After intense missions, relax in the lobby! Challenge yourself in exciting mini-games: billiards, bowling, basketball, rings or other active games. And if you want to relax, drop by the bar to chat with friends and get ready for the next mission. The lobby is your center for relaxation and planning!

  • Spy perfection

    Upgrade your skills to make missions more efficient. Improve stealth, speed, hacking, or the ability to use gadgets. Each new level opens up new opportunities to complete tasks.

  • Very stylish

    Create your own unique spy! Change your look with a variety of costumes and accessories. Use emotes and gestures to express yourself, from a cheeky wink to an all-clear signal.

How it can all go wrong:

In Undercover Fools, failure is part of the fun! Your team can accidentally attract guards, set off an alarm, or even ruin the whole plan. However, you can always get out of it with some quick thinking, quick action, and a little luck.

Add to your Wishlist and stay tuned for updates!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Quad-core or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 280 MB available space

short_description: Infiltrate a secure building, cleverly bypass guards and traps, complete tasks with the help of cool spy gadgets. Play alone or with friends, upgrade your spy skills and plan excellent missions, and most importantly... Don't screw up!
